I've seen some other manhwas like this, and even if there's a NTR vibe (and some NTR chapters) in this kind of story, it commonly goes in favor of the MC. Said that, it will take some time and difficulties to end in a happy ending. I'm fine both ways ("bad" and "happy) I just hope the MC stops acting like a pussy. What I hate of NTR it's not the cheating, but how stupid or bland can be the victims. Sorry for ranting, I know a lot of people enjoy the genre as it is, and I can understand why. Have a good night, sirs (I don't know if there are Ladies, not gonna bet for it a priori).
